comments:
I20030930

I launched Eclipse and got an error in the progress view :

ERROR: Initializing Quick Diff : An internal error occurs during: "Initializing
Quick Diff"

The .log file contains:

!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Initializing Quick Diff".
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.AssertionFailedException: assertion failed:
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.Assert.isTrue(Assert.java:101)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.Assert.isTrue(Assert.java:88)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobQueue.enqueue(JobQueue.java:79)
        at
org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobManager.changeState(JobManager.java:195)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobManager.schedule(JobManager.java:502)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.InternalJob.schedule(InternalJob.java:205)
        at org.eclipse.core.runtime.jobs.Job.schedule(Job.java:342)
        at
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.endTopLevel(AutoBuildJob.java:92)
        at
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.endTopLevel(BuildManager.java:377)
        at
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.endOperation(Workspace.java:867)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1562)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFolder.run(EclipseFolder.java:297)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.execute(Command.java:346)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.fetchDelta(RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.java:627)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.buildTree(RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.java:304)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.buildRemoteTree(RemoteFolderTreeBuilder.java:163)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.CVSWorkspaceRoot.getRemoteTree(CVSWorkspaceRoot.java:616)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.CVSWorkspaceRoot.getRemoteTree(CVSWorkspaceRoot.java:583)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.RemoteRevisionQuickDiffProvider.readDocument(RemoteRevisionQuickDiffProvider.java:205)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.RemoteRevisionQuickDiffProvider.getReference(RemoteRevisionQuickDiffProvider.java:114)
        at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.texteditor.quickdiff.DocumentLineDiffer$1.run(DocumentLineDiffer.java:510)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:61)

Tom, this looks like a bug in the CVS quick diff reference provider. Please
forward to Platform VCM if I am right.

More looks like a problem in the Job infrastructure. Moving to platform-core,
changing summary.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 43589 ***
